1.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C) and get out a dish.

2.text: Cover and roast the chicken for 25 minutes.

3.text: Remove the cover and roast the chicken for 5 minutes for crispy skin.

4.text: Shred or cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.

5.text: Heat a 1 to 3 teaspoons (5 to 15 ml) of oil over medium-high heat.

6.text: Stir in the chicken and cook it for 4 to 5 minutes.

7.text: Adjust your microwave setting to medium.

8.text: Place the chicken on a microwave-safe plate.

9.text: Microwave the chicken for 1 1/2 to 5 minutes.

10.text: Check to see if the meat has reached 165 °F (74 °C).

11.text: Consider heating it in the oven for 5 minutes if you want crispy skin.
